summary: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.
cast: Tyler Perry|Sharon Leal|Janet Jackson|Malik Yoba|Jill Scott|Richard T. Jones|Tasha Smith|Michael Jai White|Denise Boutte|Lamman Rucker|Keesha Sharp|Kaira Akita|Sheri Mann Stewart|Brian Bremer|Bart Hansard|Randall Sims|Tina Lee|Desiree Zurowski|Darla Fay|Sean Tyson|Christa Lamos|Dah-uh Morrow|Joniece Abbott-Pratt|Greyson Chadwick|Anthony B. Harris|Jamie Moore|Cesar Aguirre|Demetrius B. title: Why Did I Get Married?
